TopicTitle: Why has it taken me so long?

Articles.Content:
Hai guys, Just want to post a hello here

Been playing for like half a year now maybe longer knowing my grasp on the passage of time.. im really not sure why it has taken me this long to come get involved here.. but here i am now, so now will have to do

Whoo ramble.. so like yeah hi 0/

Meh, Took me just about as long to post on the 'welcome' thread. (today!)

So a hearty Hi right back atcha!

Off to work on my 'Munpollo' mission.......
I'm in the same boat friend! I've always loved users posts detailing missions and rockets, it's a great place for some inspiration.
